case.state: Hello everyone! I'm Muffins!
Thanks Pinkie, don't worry I know I can always count on you.
Not know you? You girls saved the school like a thousand times!
Oh what a nice coincidence, it's been a while since CHS right?
Oh what a nice coincidence, it's been a while since CHS right girls?
Hello everyone! I'm Muffins!
I'll take ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ please!
Can I get ~cards~ cards please?
I need ~cards~ cards.
I'll take ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ please!
Can I get ~cards~ cards please?
I need ~cards~ cards.
I don't think I can lose with this many numbers!
Wow! I didn't think I had this kind of luck!
I feel like I'm missing something...
The people cards are high cards, right?
I feel pretty good about this!
I think this is a winner!
I'm surprised I got this lucky.
Guess my bra breaking made the dealer be in a good mood...
This should get me through.
I don't think these are good, but I don't think these are bad either.
I guess these will do.
I was hoping for better, but these will work too.
People said I have bad coordination, so I bought a unicycle. I've been practicing juggling sitting on it!
Just because I broke all the arrows that one time doesn't mean I'm bad at archery! I really wanted to be on the archery team...
Would anyone like a muffin?
Some people ask me why I like bubbles so much. It's because blowing them is so much fun!
I'll be honest. I've never played poker before. But I'm having a lot of fun!
I really like working at the post office. There's something about delivering the mail that's just...peaceful!
Please don't tell my daughter Dinky you saw me here...I really don't wanna have to explain that to her.
People told me being a young mother would be hard. But it's been the most rewarding experience of my life!
Aw, heck!
I don't think these cards are gonna help.
I'm pretty sure these cards suck.
This is like the time I broke all the arrows at Camp Everfree...
Hey! My eyes are up here... Actually... don't look at them, look at my breasts instead...
Wait a second? Didn't the invitation say this was going to be a swimsuit party? Why am I the only one in a swimsuit then?
Wait, what!? That wasn't supposed to happen! No!
Is anyone here good at bobbing for apples? I have an excellent technique for anyone interested!
Last time I played poker was all the way back at Camp Everfree... That was also the first time I ever played poker!
Did you know that I can play the saw? I'm the only person I know who can!
I like dressing up in paper bags for Halloween! It confuses everyone!
Nobody will let me live down that time I sat on a chair and broke it...
I won best designed cart in the soapbox derby when I was younger. Boy, was Rarity mad!
I joined Chemistry Club when I got to CHS. Sure, I had a couple of test tubes blow up in my face, but that's half the fun!
Working for the post office isn't a bad job, really. Sometimes I get the wrong address, but I always fix it in the end!
One time, I dyed my hair to look like Rainbow Dash's! A lot of people confused me for her from behind.
Sometimes I like to dream about being a giant, towering over everyone!
You might not know this, but I'm pretty good a baking! Especially muffins and pies!
My favorite carnival snack is cotton candy. So sugary and sticky!
This one time at the beach, I saw Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and Rarity following Rainbow's pet tortoise Tank around...I'm still not sure what they were doing.
People say I'm uncoordinated...I say to those people, how come I can juggle on a unicycle?
Does anyone here know what it's like to be turned into granite? Me neither...
I sometimes think about what my life would be like if my eyes were better...I was a pretty good athlete when I was young.
I tried archery once...managed to break all the arrows.
I once wore Christmas lights and climbed to the top of the tree. Complete with a star hat! What a fun night that was.
You have a whole set of cards to look at instead of me, ~player~, that's the least you can do if you are not letting me cover my chest again...
Wow, it's finally my turn? I'm only wearing my bathing suit, I feel pretty lucky!

I can't complain. I'm not really wearing much!
